content:
From: Joachim Breitner <breitner@kit.edu>
Dear fellow Isabelle users,

attached is a song about using Isabelle, created for the final evening
of the Marktoberdorf Summer School 2013. I hope you can enjoy it, too.

Greetings,
Joachim

PS: If you want to link to it, you can also find it at
http://www.joachim-breitner.de/content/parodie/This_is_a_Theorem.html

PPS: Someone asked for it to be posted to the MOD facebook group. Iâ€™m
not on facebook, but maybe someone can forward it there.
